item.description: Join us for the last outdoor (free) concert of the season to see Joshua Tree.  Bring chairs/blankets/snacks.  I'll try to be there around 6 to save some space close to the front by the stage.  If you want a quick dinner to go, stop by Wahlburgers & grab a burger, or we can pop into the Hingham Beer Works after the concert if the wait's not too long (kids welcome). I have also posted this event on the Boston/Providence Single Parents Meetup calendar.
item.how_to_find_us: The concert will be on the grass directly behind the Beer Works.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: FREE Outdoor Concert / Hingham -- Joshua Tree (a U2 Tribute)
